caption.title: Estimated dengue incidence in Brazil and Colombia (per 100,000).
caption.p: Note that Zika incidence was not systematically reported prior to 2016 in Brazil ( a) or late 2015 in Colombia ( c) and that Chikungunya was not systematically reported prior to 2015 and late 2014 respectively in Brazil ( a) and Colombia ( c). In Brazil, updated data from the following yearâ€™s bulletin for 2014 to Epiweek 42, 2017 is used. States in Brazil ( b) and departments in Colombia ( d) are arranged by region and then by latitude from North to South.
